item.description:
Hello Everyone,

Another fun one that a bunch of us ran last year. This is a half marathon with non-stop rolling hills. They have a 2 person relay too. This race has a great local feel and good eats afterwards. Please comment if you need a ride or can give a ride.

http://www.applefesth...

Lets plan to meet at 9.15 am inside the main gym in the school. From memory last year this was open to everyone and a good meeting place. THERE IS NO PARKING AT THE SCHOOL and several different parking lots with free buses that take you to the school.

Any questions let me know!

Take care... Martin (who took this over from Tree!)

p.s. You are responsible for your own registration, safety etc. etc. etc.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll probably be wearing a blue Nike swoosh running tanktop.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Organised Public Event... The Awesome Applefest Half Marathon
